DOC.detailed_description: This 12-week , double blind , placebo control study evaluate efficacy gabapentin treat outpatient cannabis dependence . After initial phone screen , comprehensive screen visit schedule determine eligibility . Baseline assessment use measurement instrument conduct cannabis use , neuropsychological functioning , withdrawal , crave , pain , mood sleep . Upon enrollment , counseling , medication dispensation research assessment occur 1 time per week 3 month include assessment withdrawal , crave , pain , mood sleep . A final , follow-up visit occur end 3 month .
